product_overview: PeacePulse Journal is a comprehensive AI-powered mental wellness application designed to help users manage stress, anxiety, mood, sleep, habits, and overall mental well-being through intelligent guidance, habit tracking, and journaling in a trauma-informed and privacy-focused environment.
core_goals: Provide AI-powered, trauma-informed mental health support with crisis detection and personalized habit suggestions.
Enable users to track and manage daily moods, habits, sleep quality, and journaling to promote mental wellness.
Deliver a responsive, accessible, and visually engaging user experience across devices, with offline and local data storage ensures privacy.
Motivate users through visual progress indicators, streak tracking, and AI-generated insights to support habit formation and wellness improvement.
Ensure data persistence and seamless user experience with localStorage and optimized state management.
key_features: AI-Powered ChatBot with trauma-informed responses, mood analysis, crisis detection, and automatic habit suggestions based on conversations.
Habit Tracker with daily management, multiple categories, streak tracking, visual progress bars, and AI habit deduplication.
Mood Tracker with 5-point mood scale, auto mood detection from chat, history with notes and timestamps, and visual mood representation.
Journal System allowing daily entries with titles, mood association, and full CRUD functionality organized by date.
Sleep Tracker for logging bedtime and wake-up time, calculating sleep duration, assessing sleep quality, and tracking sleep patterns.
Lightweight Todo Management system that converts tasks into trackable habits with AI suggestions.
Calendar View to visually browse wellness data over different time periods.
Dashboard overview presenting key wellness metrics and quick access to features.
Mobile-responsive Navigation system with modern UI components.
User Settings for managing preferences and app configuration.
Toast Notifications for user feedback with color-coded statuses and auto-dismissal.
Offline functionality with local data storage to ensure privacy and data persistence without cloud dependency.
Performance optimizations including efficient React hooks, state memoization, background AI data processing, and lazy loading readiness.
user_flow_summary: User logs in and lands on the Dashboard presenting an overview of wellness metrics and quick navigation to core features.
User interacts with the AI ChatBot to receive personalized guidance, mood analysis, and habit suggestions, with crisis support as needed.
User records daily mood using the Mood Tracker manually or via AI detected mood from conversations.
User manages habits in the Habit Tracker, viewing streaks, completion grids, and progress indicators; AI helps prevent duplicate habits.
User writes and manages journal entries linked with moods and organized by date, supporting create, read, update, and delete operations.
User logs sleep data including bedtime and wake-up time, views sleep quality assessments and patterns.
User accesses a Calendar View to see wellness data trends over time.
User receives smart toast notifications for success or info messages about habit suggestions and other key interactions.
User adjusts preferences and settings to personalize the experience.
Mobile users experience optimized, responsive UI built with Shadcn/ui components and custom hooks for device detection.
validation_criteria: AI ChatBot responses are trauma-informed and provide appropriate crisis support resources.
Habit Tracker correctly records daily habits, updates streaks, and prevents duplicate habits via AI deduplication.
Mood Tracker accurately represents mood entries and reflects moods detected from chat conversations.
Journal entries support full CRUD functionality and properly associate moods and dates.
Sleep Tracker logs accurate bedtime and wake-up entries and calculates duration and quality assessments correctly.
Todo items correctly convert to trackable habits and integrate AI suggestions.
Data persists offline with no cloud dependency and syncs correctly across sessions.
Responsive design tested across device sizes and accessible with proper contrast and tooltips.
Toast notifications display correctly with appropriate color coding and auto-dismiss after 5 seconds.
Application performance is optimized with efficient React hooks, memoization, lazy loading readiness, and background AI data processing.
